name: RIDC Industrial Development Fund v. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Specialties, Inc., Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to pay costs.

casebody.head_matter:
RIDC Industrial Development Fund v. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Specialties, Inc., Appellant.
Submitted March 23, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERT, JJ.

Robert M. Brown, and Ruffin, Perry, Springer é Haslett, for appellee.
